verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G3146>scourged<s%> Him.

And the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G4120>wove<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G173>thorns<s%> and <S%G2007>put<s%> it on His <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> Him in a <S%G4210>purple<s%> <S%G2440>robe;<s%>
and they [began] to <S%G2064>come<s%> up to Him, and <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G5463>"Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>" and to <S%G1325>give<s%> Him <S%G4475>blows<s%> [in the face.]

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%G71>bringing<s%> Him out to you, that you may <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G156>guilt<s%> in Him."

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out, <S%G5409>wearing<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns<s%> and the <S%G4210>purple<s%> <S%G2440>robe.<s%> And [Pilate] <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G444>Man!<s%>"

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him, they <S%G2905>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4717>"Crucify,<s%> <S%G4717>crucify!<s%>" <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2983>"Take<s%> Him <S%G4771>yourselves,<s%> and <S%G4717>crucify<s%> Him, for I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G156>guilt<s%> in Him."

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, "We <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3551>law,<s%> and by that <S%G3551>law<s%> He <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> out [to be] the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>statement,<s%> he was the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G5399>afraid;<s%>

and he <S%G1525>entered<s%> into the <S%G4232>Praetorium<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4159>"Where<s%> are You from?" But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G612>answer.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "You do not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to me? Do You not <S%G3609>know<s%> that I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> You, and I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> You?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "You would <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2596>over<s%> Me, <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> it had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> you from <S%G509>above;<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> he who <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Me up to you <S%G2192>has<s%> [the] <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>"

As a <S%G1537>result<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2212>made<s%> <S%G2212>efforts<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> Him, but the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2905>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>Man,<s%> you are <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G2541>Caesar;<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> out [to be] a <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G483>opposes<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>"

When <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> out, and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> on the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> at a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> The <S%G3038>Pavement,<s%> but in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G1042>Gabbatha.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> it was the <S%G3904>day<s%> of <S%G3904>preparation<s%> for the <S%G3957>Passover;<s%> it was <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> your <S%G935>King!<s%>"

They <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2905>cried<s%> out, <S%G142>"Away<s%> with [Him], <S%G142>away<s%> with [Him,] <S%G4717>crucify<s%> Him!" <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Shall I <S%G4717>crucify<s%> your <S%G935>King<s%>?" The <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> but <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>"
<S%G3767>So<s%> he <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him to them to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

They <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and He <S%G1831>went<s%> out, <S%G941>bearing<s%> His <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4716>cross,<s%> to the place <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G5117>Place<s%> of a <S%G2898>Skull,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha.<s%>

<S%G3699>There<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> Him, and with Him <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G243>men,<s%> one on <S%G1782>either<s%> <S%G1782>side,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in <S%G3319>between.<s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> an <S%G5102>inscription<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> and <S%G5087>put<s%> it on the <S%G4716>cross.<s%> And it was <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2424>"JESUS<s%> THE <S%G3480>NAZARENE,<s%> THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5102>inscription<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G314>read,<s%> for the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> was <S%G1451>near<s%> the <S%G4172>city;<s%> and it was <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G4515>Latin,<s%> [and] in <S%G1676>Greek.<s%>

And <S%G3767>so<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> "Do not <S%G1125>write,<s%> 'The <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>'; but that He <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%> '"
<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3739>"What<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> I have <S%G1125>written.<s%>"

The <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> His <S%G2440>outer<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> and <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> a <S%G3313>part<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> and [also] the <S%G5509>tunic;<s%> <S%G1161>now<s%> the <S%G5509>tunic<s%> was <S%G7018>seamless,<s%> <S%G5307>woven<s%> in <S%G3650>one<s%> <S%G3650>piece.<s%>

They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> "Let us not <S%G4977>tear<s%> it, but <S%G2975>cast<s%> <S%G2975>lots<s%> for it, [to decide] <S%G5101>whose<s%> it shall be"; that the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> "They <S%G1266>divided<s%> My <S%G2440>outer<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1266>among<s%> them, and for My <S%G2441>clothing<s%> they <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%> But there were <S%G2476>standing<s%> by the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> His <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and His mother's <S%G79>sister,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the [wife] of <S%G2832>Clopas,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> His <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3936>standing<s%> <S%G3936>nearby,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> your <S%G5207>son!<s%>"

<S%G1534>Then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> your <S%G3384>mother!<s%>" And from that <S%G5610>hour<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> her into his <S%G2398>own<s%> [household.]

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> had <S%G2235>already<s%> been <S%G5055>accomplished,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G5048>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1372>am<s%> <S%G1372>thirsty.<s%>"

A <S%G4632>jar<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3690>sour<s%> <S%G3690>wine<s%> was <S%G2749>standing<s%> there; <S%G3767>so<s%> they <S%G4060>put<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of the <S%G3690>sour<s%> <S%G3690>wine<s%> upon [a branch of] <S%G5301>hyssop,<s%> and <S%G4374>brought<s%> it up to His <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G3690>sour<s%> <S%G3690>wine,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "It is <S%G5055>finished!<s%>" And He <S%G2827>bowed<s%> His <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G3860>gave<s%> up His <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it was the <S%G3904>day<s%> of <S%G3904>preparation,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> should not <S%G3306>remain<s%> on the <S%G4716>cross<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> (for that <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> was a <S%G3173>high<s%> [day]), <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that their <S%G4628>legs<s%> might be <S%G2608>broken,<s%> and [that] they might be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away.<s%>

The <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G2608>broke<s%> the <S%G4628>legs<s%> of the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4413>man,<s%> and of the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G243>man<s%> who was <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with Him;
but <S%G2064>coming<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G3708>saw<s%> that He was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2348>dead,<s%> they did not <S%G2608>break<s%> His <S%G4628>legs;<s%>

but <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3572>pierced<s%> His <S%G4125>side<s%> with a <S%G3057>spear,<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> there <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G129>blood<s%> and <S%G5204>water.<s%>

And he who has <S%G3708>seen<s%> has <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> and his <S%G3141>witness<s%> is <S%G228>true;<s%> and he <S%G3609>knows<s%> that he is <S%G3004>telling<s%> the <S%G227>truth,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that you <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

For <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> "Not a <S%G3747>bone<s%> of Him shall be <S%G4937>broken.<s%>"
And <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "They shall <S%G3708>look<s%> on Him <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G1574>pierced.<s%>"

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> of <S%G707>Arimathea,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> a <S%G3101>disciple<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> but a <S%G2928>secret<s%> [one,] for <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that he might <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%> and <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2010>granted<s%> <S%G2010>permission.<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> His <S%G4983>body.<s%>

And <S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> who had <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to Him by <S%G3571>night;<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> a <S%G3395>mixture<s%> of <S%G4666>myrrh<s%> and <S%G250>aloes,<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G3046>pounds<s%> [weight].

And <S%G3767>so<s%> they <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> it in <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>wrappings<s%> with the <S%G759>spices,<s%> as is the <S%G1779>burial<s%> <S%G1485>custom<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> in the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> He was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> there was a <S%G2779>garden;<s%> and in the <S%G2779>garden<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> had <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5087>laid.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> <S%G3904>day<s%> of <S%G3904>preparation,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> was <S%G1451>nearby,<s%> they <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>
